name: Identify Key Environmental Factors
description: Determine the environmental cues that are relevant to the science-based problem and how they may affect the solution.
expected_output: A list of key environmental factors identified from the cues.

name: Assess Constraints
description: Identify constraints related to the problem that could influence the problem-solving process, based on the key factors.
expected_output: A list of constraints that limit the possible solutions.

name: Formulate Solution Strategy
description: Develop a strategy to address the science problem by considering the key factors and constraints previously identified.
expected_output: A structured outline of the proposed solution strategy.

name: Evaluate Solution Feasibility
description: Analyze the proposed solution to ensure it is feasible, given the constraints and environmental factors identified.
expected_output: A feasibility report on the proposed solution with potential modifications.

name: Present Final Solution
description: Compile the findings and proposed solution into a coherent presentation format for review or implementation.
expected_output: A comprehensive presentation summarizing the problem-solving process and the final solution.
